title: Burse, 17th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Burse has a center of red cut and uncut velvet on a red satin ground. Border of polychrome cut and uncut velvet on a white satin ground. Trimmed with gold ribbon and backed with linen.

tombstone.epitaph:
Burse, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: silk, linen, metallic trim. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-85.
